#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

char convert(string);

int main(){
    string in;
    int T;
    char convd;
    
    cin >> T;
    
    while(T--)
    {
      cin >> in;
      convd = convert(in);

      cout << convd << "\n";
}

return 0;
//system("pause");
}

char convert(string x){
     int len = x.length();
     int ave=0;
     
     for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
     {
       ave += (int)x[i];
     }
     
     ave/=len;
     
     return (char)ave;
     }
